content.rendered: Sticky Zinc SPF 50+ is broad spectrum and up to 4 hours water resistant, with added Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) and anti-inflammatory properties of Aloe Vera and Vitamin E. Available in 2 options, light & medium colour tint, so it works well as a BB cream or in place of foundation when you want to even out your skin tone. Hardcore against the elements, but soft on your skin (plus, it really does stay on and protect your skin in all conditions)!

excerpt.rendered:
Your face is yours for life, protect it.

  • Free from PABAs, parabens, oxybenzone and octinoxate.
  • Australian owned and made.
